title: Some Scared Sister: a book of poetry about art, addiction, and belonging
description: "Some Scared Sister" is a poignant journey through the complexities of familial strife, anxiety, and addiction, framed by the transformative power of art. This collection of poetry delves into the heart of loving an addict, unearthing the pain, resilience, and indelible impact on one's psyche. With raw honesty and vivid imagery, it navigates through memories, confronts hard truths, and offers glimpses of hope and healing. Itâ€™s a testament to the non-linear path of recovery, a narrative that resonates with the strength found in vulnerability and the beauty in brokenness.
author: C.S. Mee
